extracted_entities.name: Senior Lecturer in Computer Science, Specialisation in AI Engineering

qualification_requirements.degree: Doctoral degree or equivalent in Computer Science or AI engineering

language_requirements.note: Candidates not proficient in Swedish may still be considered.

qualification_requirements.courses: Completed training in higher education pedagogy preferred.

weights.scientific_excellence: Equal weight to pedagogical and scientific excellence.
special_weights: Merits in teaching in computer science applied to AI Engineering.
Recent research in computer science applied to AI Engineering.
considerable_weights: Contribution to new knowledge and experience.
Current collaboration with the wider community.

application_requirements: Certificate of completed courses in higher education pedagogy
